title: Brad Keselowski
summary: Bradley Aaron Keselowski (/kɛzˈlaʊski/; born February 12, 1984) is an American professional stock car racing driver. He competes full-time in the NASCAR Cup Series, driving the No. 6 Ford Mustang GT for RFK Racing, a team he also co-owns. He was the owner of Brad Keselowski Racing, which fielded two full-time teams in the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series.
